PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SanitaryTerminalTypeShower
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Installation or waste water appliance that emits a spray of water to wash the human body (BS6100).

PropertyDef.Name: ShowerType
PropertyDef.Definition:
Selection of the type of shower from the enumerated list of types where:-
Drench = Shower that rapidly gives a thorough soaking in an emergency Individual = Shower unit that is typically enclosed and is for the use of one person at a time Tunnel = Shower that has a succession of shower heads or spreaders that operate simultaneously along its length

PropertyDef.Name: HasTray
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the shower has a separate receptacle that catches the water in a shower and directs it to a waste outlet.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted width of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted depth of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: Material
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the object is constructed

PropertyDef.Name: MaterialThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: Thickness of the material from which the object is constructed

PropertyDef.Name: ShowerHeadDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: A description of the shower head(s) that emit the spray of water

PropertyDef.Name: DrainSize
PropertyDef.Definition: The size of the drain outlet connection from the object
